title: Trump Misinformation on Charlotte Murder Case
summary: Trump falsely claimed the suspect in a Charlotte murder case came through open borders. The suspect was a U.S. citizen.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the spread of misinformation and its potential impact on public perception of immigration issues.

title: Hayward: Major Employer in Clemmons, NC
summary: Hayward, a swimming pool filter maker based in Charlotte, employs over 1,000 workers in Clemmons, NC.
charlotte_impact: Showcases the economic importance of manufacturing companies in smaller North Carolina towns.

title: Trade Shows in Charlotte Leverage Canopy Tents
summary: Charlotte trade show exhibitors focus on flexibility, visibility, and ROI when using custom canopy tents.
charlotte_impact: Illustrates marketing strategies employed by businesses participating in Charlotte trade shows.

title: Mosaic Capital Partners Seeks VP in Charlotte
summary: Mosaic Capital Partners, a Charlotte-based private equity firm, is seeking a Vice President of Business Development.
charlotte_impact: Indicates growth and investment activity within the private equity sector in Charlotte.

title: Florence Airport Passengers Up, Flight Lost to Charlotte
summary: Florence Regional Airport saw increased passenger traffic in 2025 but lost an American Airlines flight to Charlotte.
charlotte_impact: Reflects the competitive dynamics of regional air travel and the impact of larger hubs.

title: Women Charged in Torture, Death of Girl in Charlotte
summary: Three women are charged with torturing and killing a girl, keeping her in a dog crate at a Charlotte home.
charlotte_impact: Reports a horrific case of child abuse and raises concerns about child welfare in the community.

title: Warmer Weather Arrives for Meteorological Spring
summary: Patchy fog will give way to sunshine and 70-degree temperatures, marking the start of meteorological spring.
charlotte_impact: Provides a weather update and signals the changing of seasons.

title: NC Lawmakers Divided on Iran Strikes
summary: North Carolina lawmakers are split along party lines regarding the US-Israel 'Operation Epic Fury' strikes on Iran.
charlotte_impact: Illustrates the political polarization surrounding foreign policy issues at the state level.

title: Sinkhole Swallows Truck in Gastonia
summary: A sinkhole in Gastonia swallowed a pickup truck overnight. No injuries were reported.
charlotte_impact: Highlights infrastructure challenges and potential safety hazards in the area.

title: Charlotte Protests Against Iran Strikes
summary: Protesters in Charlotte are rallying against the U.S.-Israeli military strikes on Iran at Romare Bearden Park.
charlotte_impact: Demonstrates local opposition to international military actions and freedom of assembly.

title: Huntersville to Address Congested Corridor
summary: Huntersville plans to address traffic congestion on NC-115, a major artery experiencing standstill traffic during rush hour.
charlotte_impact: Addresses local transportation issues and infrastructure planning.

title: Early Voting Ends for NC Primary Elections
summary: North Carolina residents have until 3 p.m. Saturday to vote early in the pivotal primary elections.
charlotte_impact: Informs residents about important election deadlines and encourages civic participation.

title: Overnight Shooting in East Charlotte Injures One
summary: An overnight shooting in east Charlotte on E W.T. Harris Boulevard left one person critically injured.
charlotte_impact: Reports on local crime and public safety concerns.

title: I-485 Express Lanes Open in Charlotte
summary: The I-485 Express Lanes in south Charlotte are now open, offering a faster route between I-77 and U.S. 74.
charlotte_impact: Announces the completion of a major infrastructure project aimed at improving traffic flow.

title: Woman Dies After Assault in East Charlotte
summary: A woman has died weeks after being assaulted in east Charlotte. The suspect is in custody.
charlotte_impact: Reports on a violent crime and the subsequent arrest of a suspect.
